titles.title: Independent Sales Representatives Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1993
To amend section 507(a)(3) of title 11 of the United States Code to give priority to certain claims of persons that are independent sales representatives.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1225)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 5/12/1993--Introduced. Independent Sales Representatives Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1993 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to include the claims and expenses of an independent sales representative among those entitled to statutory priority status.
